docs.snippet: LEAD: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences will consider charges by some prominent film makers that a conflict of interest could have affected the choice of nominees in this year's documentary film category. Bruce Davis, the academy's e...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences will consider charges by some prominent film makers that a conflict of interest could have affected the choice of nominees in this year's documentary film category. Bruce Davis, the academy's executive director, said ''the issue will get a hearing'' at the academy's next board meeting in April in Los

docs.snippet: LEAD: A Federal jury has rejected a $25 million claim that STEVIE WONDER'S song ''I Just Called to Say I Love You'' was plagiarized from the work of another songwriter. LLOYD CHIATE, the plaintiff, claimed that Mr. Wonder's song was stolen from hi...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A Federal jury has rejected a $25 million claim that STEVIE WONDER'S song ''I Just Called to Say I Love You'' was plagiarized from the work of another songwriter. LLOYD CHIATE, the plaintiff, claimed that Mr. Wonder's song was stolen from his own song ''I Just Called to Say,'' which he wrote with LEE GARRE

docs.snippet: LEAD: CARLY SIMON added a Grammy Award to her Oscar and Golden Globe Award for her song ''Let the River Run,'' from the movie ''Working Girl.'' The song, she said, was ''an anthem for New York.'' It is played as the movie starts, with a scene of o...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: CARLY SIMON added a Grammy Award to her Oscar and Golden Globe Award for her song ''Let the River Run,'' from the movie ''Working Girl.'' The song, she said, was ''an anthem for New York.'' It is played as the movie starts, with a scene of office workers traveling to Manhattan on the Staten Island ferry.

docs.snippet: LEAD:    COLLEGE BASKETBALL       Simmons Has 34 as La Salle Coasts       Lionel Simmons moved past Oscar Robertson into fifth place on the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I scoring list with 34 points last night as La Salle, pla...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: COLLEGE BASKETBALL Simmons Has 34 as La Salle Coasts Lionel Simmons moved past Oscar Robertson into fifth place on the National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I scoring list with 34 points last night as La Salle, playing in Baltimore, defeated Loyola of Maryland, 110-81, for its 15th consecutive victory.

docs.snippet: LEAD: ''Crowbar,'' the newest site-specific project of Anne Hamburger's En Garde Arts company, is an act of reclamation and renewal. On Sunday, the Mac Wellman play reopened the Victory Theater on West 42d Street as a home for legitimate theater -...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''Crowbar,'' the newest site-specific project of Anne Hamburger's En Garde Arts company, is an act of reclamation and renewal. On Sunday, the Mac Wellman play reopened the Victory Theater on West 42d Street as a home for legitimate theater - unfortunately only through March 11.

headline.main: Review/Theater;   Lead Role for a Theater, With the Audience on Stage

docs.snippet: LEAD:    CLASSICAL       Lloyd: Symphony No. 5    BBC Philharmonic conducted by George Lloyd. Albany TROY-022; CD and cassette.       Much of George Lloyd's music is autobiographical, or at least reflective of world events during his lifetime. His...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: CLASSICAL Lloyd: Symphony No. 5 BBC Philharmonic conducted by George Lloyd. Albany TROY-022; CD and cassette. Much of George Lloyd's music is autobiographical, or at least reflective of world events during his lifetime. His Fifth Symphony (there are apparently 11 to date) was written in Switzerland while the composer was slowly recovering from serious wartime injuries.

docs.snippet: LEAD: Oscar is doing it, and so is Calvin. So, in fact, are Geoffrey and Bill. What Oscar de la Renta, Calvin Klein, Geoffrey Beene and Bill Blass are doing is knocking themselves off in lower-priced lines that have the potential of reaching many ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Oscar is doing it, and so is Calvin. So, in fact, are Geoffrey and Bill. What Oscar de la Renta, Calvin Klein, Geoffrey Beene and Bill Blass are doing is knocking themselves off in lower-priced lines that have the potential of reaching many more customers and ringing up millions of dollars more in sales.

headline.main: Fashion;   Spreading Style at Lower Prices
